Class BaseCrudService<T,ID>

java.lang.Object
com.odintsov.wallpapers_project.application.services.BaseCrudService<T,ID>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity
ID - the type of the entity identifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.odintsov.wallpapers_project.application.interfaces.BaseService<T,ID>
public abstract class BaseCrudService<T,ID> extends Object implements com.odintsov.wallpapers_project.application.interfaces.BaseService<T,ID>
Base abstract CRUD service that provides common operations for interacting with a JPA repository.

This class implements the BaseService interface and delegates all CRUD operations to the injected JpaRepository instance. It is intended to be extended by concrete service classes for specific entities.

      public T update(ID id, T entity)
      Updates an existing entity with the given ID.

      This method checks whether the entity with the given ID exists before saving the updated entity.
